com.teampc.model.question

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teampc.model.question.Question
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeQuestion, MatchingQuestion, MultipleChoiceQuestion, ShortAnswerQuestion

    public abstract class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a test question. Different question types extend this type.
